title: Beautiful 3Bed 2Bath Condo for Rent
description:
Stunning and spacious condo with bright, natural light and high ceilings. This recently renovated unit has an open-floor plan complete with hard wood floors, ample closet space, custom lights with built-in dimmers, state-of-the-art, energy efficient appliances, a private garage and driveway, and an individual laundry room.
The main floor includes a (1) master bedroom with a large walk-in closet (2) a modern bathroom upgraded with a rain shower and custom wall to floor design, (3) a second room with a spacious closet, (3) a walk-in pantry closet, (4) a full bathroom with custom-backsplash (5) kitchen with custom-built island bar, (6) open and bright living room (7) dining nook and (8) a juliet balcony.
The 2nd floor loft acts as a third bedroom (or additional living space as you see fit), which overlooks the living room and includes an extra large walk-in closet, as well as a modern, working fireplace.
Additional Rental Amenities:
-Ample closet space, including 3 walk-ins, 5 total
-Bespoke, automatic control skylight in kitchen with sensitive motor sensor technology for weather control, includes remote
-Stainless steel appliances include energy-efficient dishwasher and refrigerator with alarm, built-in microwave, gas oven and stove-top range, motion-sensor stainless steel sink faucet with adjustable nozzle
-Oak cabinets (dark) with stainless steel knobs
-Gorgeous, wood-framed energy-efficient windows built for insulation optimization and cost-effective temperature controls
-Custom blinds for windows
-Central AC/ Gas Heat; corridor thermostat
-Backyard access
-Brand new roof, 2022
-Condo Association maintains flower-gardens, trees, bushes, & grass, snow removal, and shoveling.
Neighborhood Attractions:
Prime location in the far North East near the Deleware River, uniquely situated between Holy Family University and breath-taking Glen Foerd historic park. A short walk (less than 10 minutes) to the train station (Torresdale, Trenton Line), and about a 3 minute drive from I-95. Several top-rated NE restaurants and bars close by. Minutes to Bucks County suburbs, Neshaminy mall, Neshaminy state Park, and about a 25 minute drive to downtown Philadelphia.
Neighborhood is quiet and welcoming.
Tenant pays all utilities
No smoking in building
Application fee $50
Cats and small dogs ok

description:
West Mt Airy, Philadelphia,offers a beautiful, popular neighborhood, tree-lined streets, friendly neighbors, caring neighborhood organizations, and access to popular nearby Wissahickon Valley Green – miles and miles of a wooded area with a creek, trails, for biking and hiking and walking your dog. It also has an excellent restaurant in this park.
Nearby is a  cobblestone area with lots of shops and  restaurants including outdoor eating. Mt Airy offers easy access to center city, and to many colleges - just a few miles from Chestnut Hill College, Arcadia University, LaSalle University, Jefferson University (East Falls Campus).  The apartment is located 1 1/2 blocks from train to center city - access to U of PA, Drexel, Temple, Jefferson etc. about 12-15 minute car ride  to center city or a beautiful bike path by the river. title: Lovely 2 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms apartment
description: This gorgeous three story 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom includes parking for up to 2 cars, 1200 sqft of living space and 1200 sqft of lawn plus 3 outdoor spaces! Enter the open concept living room/dining room with hardwood floors, crown molding and baseboard trim and walk back to the spacious kitchen. With gorgeous cherry cabinetry, granite counters and breakfast bar, modern black refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher, gas range/oven and garbage disposal. Walk out to enjoy your large, private back yard that goes all the way through to Opal Street, where there is 1 car parking, plus room to pull another car in through the back gate if desired. Cooking out is easy with the provided grill and picnic table. first bedroom and full bathroom. With a custom-built queen size murphy bed, large closets and plenty of storage. Off the hall is also the first deck, perfect for lounging, as well as a full bathroom with tub/shower combination. crown molding, and en-suite full bathroom with large tiled shower and double vanity. A second deck off the back of this floor includes spiral stairs to the full roof top deck. With the privacy afforded by no adjoining decks and an amazing Center City skyline view, this is the perfect place to watch the fireworks on the provided 7-piece furniture set. Walking downstairs there is a fully finished basement with new Berber carpets and recessed lighting, plus a mounted flat screen tv with sound bar, and laundry room with full size washer and dryer. With one-zone C/A and multiple thermostats, central heat, ceiling fans in the bedrooms, and an included alarm monitoring service, this home has it all! *Cats and dogs permitted.

title: Renovated Studio Apt Home on Rittenhouse Square, Lounge, Yoga Studio
description:
The studio apartment home at 2111 is available for lease at this moment! This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite counters. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. This home on the 21st floor features large windows that face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as October 10, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at Sue's Produce Market, the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Whole Foods, and Sprouts. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Paper Source, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, The Dr. Martens Store, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Brooklinen, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Theory, Tselaine, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Pizzeria Vetri, Luke's Lobster Rittenhouse, Tria Cafe Rittenhouse, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, HipCityVeg, The Love, Via Locusta, and The Dandelion. Savor a coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, and Alchemy. Have a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen and Jeni's. Try the Rittenhouse Churro at El Merkury! Stroll across the park and then buy a French baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Grab a babka, sticky bun, scone, or brookie from The Bakeshop on 20th. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar, Nail Spa Bar, or Coco Blue Spruce. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Mütter Museum. Shop at the fabulous farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!

* Laundry room with a single washer and a single dryer on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.

* Dishwasher

* Granite kitchen countertops
* Wood floors

title: Spacious 3 bedroom house for rent
description:
A quiet neighborhood and wonderful neighbors...the perfect house for your family. This house has 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, it is compact yet roomy. The entry, kitchen, bathrooms and laundry are tiled with carpeting in living room and bedrooms. The fireplace is located in the living room, with a large niche for your entertainment center. The bright kitchen invites you in the eat-in area with your family. The master bedroom has a sliding door leading out to the backyard concrete patio, the closet has mirrored wardrobe door and built-ins. The master bath has a bathtub with shower, carpet and tile... the 2 other bedrooms have mirrored wardrobe doors. Just down the hall is the the second bathroom and laundry room...and goes right out to the garage. The backyard is large enough for children to run around, or entertain your family and friends. Three ways to reach the backyard...maybe four...through the kitchen, through the master bedroom and out the side door of the garage...and there is the gate. Must see to appreciate. There are various walking trails throughout the community including a trail beginning at Chapman Heights Rd. and Oak Glen and ending near Chapman Heights Rd. and Gold Mountain. which is approximately 2 miles. Princeton Park is a little pocket park located off Princeton Dr. and Campus Way.

title: All within your reach! Bella Vista 3 bed 2 bath townhome + garage!
description:
705 Pemberton Street unit 711R – Available Now – 3 Bed 2 bath townhome with Garage
Amazing Bella Vista Location!! This three Bedroom, Two Full Baths Home with Garage Parking is available for rent.
Located in the Carriage Mews Condo Development this 1990 built townhome is tucked away off of Pemberton Street. Enter through the private gates into a serene shared courtyard with mature plantings including Japanese Maple trees and hostas. The first floor has a living room with a wood burning fireplace, beautiful wood parquet flooring, a mechanical/storage closet , a custom floor to ceiling bookcase, and french doors that look onto the garden courtyard. There is a very large eat in kitchen with a gas stove, a custom artisan tile backsplash, tons of countertop space and storage, a terra cotta tile floor, and a durable Corian countertop. Finally, there is a deep hall closet for storage that was a half bath prior. On the second floor, the study has a wood burning fireplace, shelving, oak hardwood flooring, and large windows allowing natural light to pour in. Also, there is a hallway full bath with additional storage space, and a washer and dryer
and a generous sized bedroom as well. The third floor includes a second bedroom, a full hallway bath with a skylight, and a small third bedroom with sliders leading to the East facing deck overlooking the tree tops and note there is the ability to add a roof deck also.
The garage is located directly to the right of the entrance gate and has some storage space as well.
The home is located in the Meredith catchment, a National Blue Ribbon school, and is a half a block down from Cianfrani Park, a neighborhood gem. Fantastic restaurants like Fiorella, Bistro La Minette, and Kalaya Thai Kitchen just a few blocks away as well as close proximity to the highways.

title: Beautifully Renovated 2 bedroom/1bath in Fishtown
description:
Available NOW | Leasing Special: $1,325/month for a 18 month lease; or $1,375/month for a 12 month lease.
Beautiful corner unit!  This 2 bedroom / 1 bathroom apartment welcomes you into the main living space with exposed brick, large windows for sunlight, & exposed ductwork. The kitchen area is at the back and is fully equipped with white shaker cabinets, subway tile back splash, and sleek stainless steel appliances including a microwave, dishwasher, electric range, and refrigerator. Continue to your stunning bathroom boasting a modern gray vanity and gorgeous shower stall with detailed floor-to-ceiling tiling and a glass door. On the other side of the unit you will find your 2 bedrooms with spacious closets. The corner bedroom is a bit larger and receives a ton of natural light! Unit features hardwood floors, central air, washer / dryer, and recessed lighting throughout!
About The Neighborhood:
Located in Norris Square and walkable to tons of great shopping, eating, and entertainment options. You’ll be surrounded by public transportation bus routes for a quick commute throughout the city. Close proximity to Norris Square Park, Towey Playground, and La Placita Park. Just blocks from fantastic spots including Sunflower Philly, Human Robot, Cousins Supermarket, Luna Cafe, Original 13 Ciderworks, Halftime Goodtimes, Sidekicks Sports Bar & Grill, and countless more!
Lease Terms:
Generally, first month, last month, and one month security deposit due at, or prior to, lease signing. Other terms may be required by Landlord. $55 application fee per applicant. Strictly, no pets. Tenants responsible for: electricity, cable/internet, and water. Landlord Requirements: Applicants to make a minimum of 3x the monthly rent in verifiable net income, no landlord filings or evictions within the past 4 years, and must have a verifiable rental history.
